text: A boy from India was sent to study at a school in another country. A few weeks passed, and one day the young boy learned that there was another Indian boy at school and he felt happy. He investigated the boy and found out that the boy was from the same village as him and experienced a great deal of satisfaction. Later, she received news that the child was her age and was very pleased. A few more weeks passed and he finally found out that the boy was like him and had his own name. Then, to tell you the truth, her happiness was immeasurable. FIN
title: Conocerse a uno mismo
author: nan Anónimo
